summary: Simply a Merge of all 4 armor packs created by Maty743 on Steam.
descriptionHtml:
Simply a Merge of all 4 armor packs created by Maty743 on Steam. ITM's removed, and there are no conflicts between these mods. The ID's have all been renumbered so unfortunately you can not use their old ID's in the console window. Fortunately you can still easily find these using the console and use the ID's shown in the console. Simply type help "item name" to get their id.


Bosmer Plain Set: All items Require the Elven Smithing perk. They can be created at any forge under the Elven category. ~Light Armor~

1. Bosmer Armor
2. Bosmer Helmet
3. Bosmer Mask
4. Bosmer Gloves
5. Bosmer Hood
6. Bosmer Hooded Helm
7. Bosmer Boots
8. Bosmer Shoulder Cape
9. Bosmer Arrow
10. Bosmer Short Blade
11. Bosmer Bow

Bosmer Reinforced Set: All items Require the Advanced Armors perk. They can be created at any forge under the Elven category. ~Heavy Armor~

1. Bosmer Reinforced Armor
2. Bosmer Reinforced Gauntlets
3. Bosmer Reinforced Helmet
4. Bosmer Reinforced Hooded Helm
5. Bosmer Reinforced Boots
6. Bosmer Full Cape

Bosmer Elder Set: All items Require the Glass Smithing perk. They can be created at any forge under the Elven category. ~Light Armor~

1. Bosmer Elder Armor
2. Bosmer Helmet
3. Bosmer Elder Gloves
4. Bosmer Elder Hooded Helm
5. Bosmer Elder Hood
6. Bosmer Elder Boots
7. Bosmer Elder Shoulder Cape
8. Bosmer Elder Arrow
9. Bosmer Elder Short Blade
10. Bosmer Elder Bow

Bosmer Wild Hunt Set: The Wild Hunt armors can only be acquired by defeating the Champion of the Hunt. The Champion of the Hunt can be found at Shadowgreen Cavern just north of the Thalmor Embesy (Top left of skyrim). It is highly recommended to be a high level character as you will be facing off against a level 80 character and other strong enemies. The armors have the same armor stats as Dragon bone and Dragon Scale armors. ~Heavy Armor~

1. Wild Hunt Armor
2. Wild Hunt Hooded Helm
3. Wild Hunt Gauntlets
4. Wild Hunt Boots id

Bosmer Wild Hunt Light Set: See Wild Hunt description above. ~Light~

1. Wild Hunt Hood
2. Wild Hunt Light Gauntlets
3. Wild Hunt Light Boots
4. Wild Hunt Light Armor
author: Jgizle
